Summary Note:
Olivia Romane Peiren and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Brussels. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Olivia Romane Peiren is a 36 year old and comes from Belgium.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Olivia Romane Peiren is married to Sanders. They are proud parents of 2 children: Hortense and Janssens.
Education Background:
Olivia received her secondary school diploma from Heilige Familiecollege in 2006.
After that, she went on to study at University of Namur until 2011.
She also pursued further higher education at Ghent University, graduating in 2016.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 13 years, Olivia Romane Peiren brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Olivia Romane Peiren launched her career as a Property Manager at AG Real Estate SA, where she gained valuable experience from 2012 to 2015.
In 2015, she moved to Warehouses De Pauw SA to work as a Developer, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
She spent 6 years working as a Construction Company Owner at Befimmo SA, refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 130000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns townhouse in Ostend, where she resides. It is worth 11000000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 7350000 EUR from her grandfather, a respected Investment Banker, in 2017, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Olivia has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
